argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | subgcl.p | |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( G |`s S ) = ( G |`s S ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_subggrp | |- ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> ( G |`s S ) e. Grp ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_3ad2ant1 | |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ X e. S /\ Y e. S ) -> ( G |`s S ) e. Grp ) |
| 5 |  | #P_simp2 | |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ X e. S /\ Y e. S ) -> X e. S ) |
| 6 | 2 | #P_subgbas | |- ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> S = ( Base ` ( G |`s S ) ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_3ad2ant1 | |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ X e. S /\ Y e. S ) -> S = ( Base ` ( G |`s S ) ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_eleqtrd | |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ X e. S /\ Y e. S ) -> X e. ( Base ` ( G |`s S ) ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_simp3 | |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ X e. S /\ Y e. S ) -> Y e. S ) |
| 10 | 9, 7 | #P_eleqtrd | |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ X e. S /\ Y e. S ) -> Y e. ( Base ` ( G |`s S ) ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( G |`s S ) ) = ( Base ` ( G |`s S ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` ( G |`s S ) ) = ( +g ` ( G |`s S ) ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_grpcl | |- ( ( ( G |`s S ) e. Grp /\ X e. ( Base ` ( G |`s S ) ) /\ Y e. ( Base ` ( G |`s S ) ) ) -> ( X ( +g ` ( G |`s S ) ) Y ) e. ( Base ` ( G |`s S ) ) ) |
| 14 | 4, 8, 10, 13 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ X e. S /\ Y e. S ) -> ( X ( +g ` ( G |`s S ) ) Y ) e. ( Base ` ( G |`s S ) ) ) |
| 15 | 2, 1 | #P_ressplusg | |- ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> .+ = ( +g ` ( G |`s S ) ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_3ad2ant1 | |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ X e. S /\ Y e. S ) -> .+ = ( +g ` ( G |`s S ) ) ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_oveqd | |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ X e. S /\ Y e. S ) -> ( X .+ Y ) = ( X ( +g ` ( G |`s S ) ) Y ) ) |
| 18 | 14, 17, 7 | #P_3eltr4d | |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ X e. S /\ Y e. S ) -> ( X .+ Y ) e. S ) |
